info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 4:53AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Northampton, southwestern Greensville and southern Brunswick Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 453 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ebony, or 11 miles northeast of Warrenton, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke Rapids, Brunswick, Gaston, Barley, Gasburg, Ebony, Ante, Gum Forks, Triplet, Bowens Corner, Henrico, White Plains, Vultare, Valentines, Slates Corner, Roanoke Rapids Lake and Lake Gaston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
